Bakalova is a 24-year-old Bulgarian actress and singer and stars alongside Baron Cohen as Borat’s daughter Tutar in one of her first major English-language films.  Born on 4 June 1996 in Burgas, Bulgaria, she grew up learning music, taking singing and flute lessons from the age of six. She studied acting for drama theatre and flute at the National School of Arts in Burgas, and later at the National Academy for Theatre and Film Arts in Sofia, graduating last year, according to IMDB. Her acting credits so far include several Bulgarian TV shows and films including Tipichno and Last Call. She has also appeared in the Italian series Gomorrah as well as in several shorts. She has played the role of Borat’s daughter Tutar previously, alongside Cohen on Jimmy Kimmel Live! ahead of the film being released. She has received praise in reviews for her work in Borat 2, with reviewers calling her “fearless“, “quick-witted” and “a real discovery”.
